verses.content: Chun, lal Ahasuer chun ram le tuisuoriet thlierkârhai chunga chun leiman a siem a.

Chuongchun, a thilthawtheizie le a hrâtna thilthawhai po po le, Mordekai ropuizie chanchin famkim, lalin ama ân kaisângtir nasatzie chu Media le Persia lalhai chanchin ziekna bua chun a chuong a ni naw am a nih?
A chipuihai laia chun thlamuong- na thu hrilin, a mihai ta ding thil ṭha zawngin, a unau mi tamtakhai ilâwm le Juda mihai laia ropuitak le lal Ahasuer dawttu, Juda mi Mordekai chu a ni sih a.
